item.title: Documentation generation for web apps - PHP and JavaScript
item.description: Recently I’ve been making some changes to a relatively complex ePCR (electronic patient care report) program that I wrote for the ambulance corps. It’s a web application (available only on our LAN, of course) written in PHP, with a relatively large chunk of custom javascript to provide Ajax …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: JavaScript and Emacs, and updates
item.description:
Well, thankfully, summer classes are almost over (tomorrow is the last class). I have a big paper to write for one of them, due at the worst time possible - July 5th. The day after what is, probably, one of the busiest days of the year for the ambulance corps.

In …
